pullrequest.title: Create an EventManager to be used on a per SimulationRunner basis.

content.raw:
The name `Init` might be confusing. To me, the name 'Init' indicates that the function can be called multiple times, mostly commonly when a well know initial state needs to be established. 

After looking at this, you might want to swap 'Configure'  and 'Init'. So, `Configure` is called after construction and `Init` is called when it's added to the simulation runner. 

What do you think @chapulina and @carromj ?
